TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tfuya, title = Tfuya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tfuya} }

S.FORM: Tfuya Itiniay i Alishan Cen no Chiayi ko Tfuya a niyaro', 122 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 389 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 374 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Cou90%, Bunun1%, roma1%.

Tfoya Itiniay i Alishan Cen no Chiayi ko Tfoya a niyaro', 122 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 389 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 96% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 374 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 4% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Coo90%, Bonon1%, roma1%.
